scripts.db:setup: docker compose exec -T db psql -U postgres -d football -f /database/setup.sql
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --wait && sleep 5 && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d football
scripts.db:teams: npm run db:shell -- -c "SELECT id, name, country FROM teams ORDER BY name"
scripts.db:count: npm run db:shell -- -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_teams FROM teams"
scripts.migrate:run: npm run migrate:copy-sql && npm run db:setup
